text.autoconfig.urkazmoontools.title: Urkaz Moon Tools Config
text.autoconfig.urkazmoontools.option.se: Yes (default): The 'Lunar Sensor' only emits Redstone at night.
No: The 'Lunar Sensor' emits Redstone all day.
Full Moon Redstone strength 8 instead of 1
The 'Lunar Sensor' emits Redstone in the following way:
Full Moon 8 | Waxing Gibbous 7 | First Quarter 6 | Waxing Crescent 5 | New Moon 4 | Waning Crescent 3 | Third Quarter 2 | Waning Gibbous 1 | SensorBlock
Waxing Gibbous 8 | First Quarter 7 | Waxing Crescent 6 | New Moon 5 | Waning Crescent 4 | Third Quarter 3 | Waning Gibbous 2 | Full Moon 1 | SensorBlock
text.autoconfig.urkazmoontools.option.em: Redstone strength of 9 during a lunar event
No (default): The 'Lunar Sensor' emmits the regular amount of Redstone during an event.
Yes: The 'Lunar Sensor' emmits 9 units of Redstone during an event.
